http.html:
We use cookies to ensure that we give you the best experience on our website. We also use cookies to ensure we show you advertising that is relevant to you. If you continue without changing your settings, we'll assume that you are happy to receive all cookies on the SOAR website. However, if you would like to, you can change your cookie settings at any time by amending your browser settings.   Read More...

Cookies enable us to identify your device, or you when you have logged in. We use cookies that are strictly necessary to enable you to move around the site or to provide certain basic features. We use cookies to enhance the functionality of the website by storing your preferences, for example. We also use cookies to help us to improve the performance of our website to provide you with a better user experience. We don't sell the information collected by cookies, nor do we disclose the information to third parties, except where required by law (for example to government bodies and law enforcement agencies.   Show Less...

SOAR

Standard of Asset Recognition

“WE MAKE ASSETS TALK”

WHAT
IS
SOAR

SOAR is a cloud-based enterprise solution combined with an easy to use smartphone app that delivers a suite of secure solutions, services and essential data to Clients in real time.

more...

Depending on the solution required, SOAR utilises tamper proof asset NFC tags as the conduit for data transfer between the asset and app. This highly secure technology is at the core of Apple Pay and Contactless Visa and utilises the same tap and scan process to verify an asset for a variety of commercial applications.

Our simple question, why incur the expense and complication of multiple systems and suppliers when one solution can provide access to the data you need?

SOAR is multifunction and modular; meaning each of the products can work in standalone or in combination with each other.

Currently the SOAR portfolio encompasses 3 commercialised products and an ability to develop a solution tailored to a specific client or sector requirements.

Click buttons to read more...

SOAR_inventory

Asset Management & Risk Minimisation tool

SOAR_inspection

Legally Compliant Roadworthiness, Safety & Compliance Tool

SOAR_appraisal

Vehicle Appraisal, Reconditioning & Valuation Tool

SOAR_bespoke

Including Digital Licencing, Digital Certification & Anti-Counterfeiting.

SOAR PORTAL

SOAR's Web based Client Portal eliminates the need for software installation and provides access to data from anywhere. Replicating the ease of use of the smartphone App, the Portal provides intuitive functionality and feature access.

SERVICES

SERVICES

Purchasing SOAR isn't about buying an App or even a Platform. It is a about having the best fit Enterprise solution. It's about knowing that this partner has the capability to adapt and provide value-added services as and when your organisation requires them.

WHAT IT COSTS

WHAT IT COSTS

WHAT IT COSTS

Each project is individual developed to the needs of each Client. Each package contains an element for Set-Up / Rollout and an annual fee encompassing a Client support package. At SOAR we never want you to feel you're on your own.

FREE TRIAL / PILOT PROGRAMME

SOAR makes bold claims about how it can improve and even transform Clients commercial activities when adopting our solutions.

However, you wouldn't buy a car without test-driving it!

Why not see SOAR in action? Live with it and see just how it can transform your processes and deliver financially to your bottom line.

Book a free trial and we'll make it happen!

Projects are individually developed to the needs of each Client with packages containing an element for Set-Up / Rollout and an annual fee encompassing a Client support package. With SOAR you're never on your own.

TRANSPARENT PRICING

SOAR projects have no hidden costs with all elements easy to understand. For both our _appraisal ' _inspection products we have menu pricing!

Client proposals are developed; each aspect of the project is costed, detailing what is included (hours, visits, number of vehicles etc.) and rate applied.

This gives Clients the power to further amend the package to their needs or even compare us to other potential suppliers.

TRANSPARENT PRICING

A proposal is developed where each aspect of the project is costed, detailing what is included, the units allocated (hours, visits, number of vehicles etc.) and rate applied. This gives Clients the power to further amend the package to their needs or even compare us to other potential suppliers.

ABOUT US

ABOUT US

ABOUT US

SOAR has been developed by LUMINOSITY Ltd., in-house from concept to commercialisation. It is the product of the skills, experience and commercial insight of the 4 partners that make up the core team.

SHARON KAVANAGH BANKS

CEO & FOUNDER

Finance, Logistics, Taxation, Marketing & Product Management

STEPHEN McLERNON

CMO & SALES DIRECTOR

Sales, Marketing, Operational & Product Management

MARK COTTER

CTO

IT, Web, Mobile, Systems Management & Development

EMELYN MURRAY

COO

Business solutions / BPR, Operations, Facilities, CRM, IT

Sharon & Stephen bring over combined 30 years experience working in senior management roles for high profile and successful brands within the motor industry at Irish, UK and at direct European manufacturer level.

more...

Mark and Emelyn deliver a wealth of expertise encompassing NFC technology, database building, mobile applications, transaction solutions and secure data transfer making them the ideal fit for the product. They have worked delivered projects for Fiat Chrysler Automobiles, Coca-Cola, Trocaire, Intel, Marie Keating Foundation, Punchestown and Celtic Media Group Newspapers.

Each team member has specialised areas of expertise with shared operational and implementation skillsets. Simply, we get things done!

FAQs

FAQs

FAQs

WHAT DOES THE CLIENT NEED TO SUPPLY IN ORDER TO USE SOAR?

WHAT DOES THE CLIENT NEED TO SUPPLY IN ORDER TO USE SOAR?

A smartphone, web access and in case of SOAR_inventory and _inspection a core level of asset data that is the basis of a master asset database.

WILL SOAR WORK ON ANYTHING?

WILL SOAR WORK ON ANYTHING?

Yep, it works on any kind of asset irrespective of size or value.

DO YOU NEED MOBILE COVERAGE OR WI-FI ACCESS TO USE SOAR?

DO YOU NEED MOBILE COVERAGE OR WI-FI ACCESS TO USE SOAR?

No. While SOAR primarily communicates using mobile connectivity or wifi, each of our product have been created with the capability to work offline.

IS THE SYSTEM SECURE?

IS THE SYSTEM SECURE?

Yes. The system is secured with standard encryption methods and is further enhanced with individual databases created for each client to separate data.
